page.title: 01Peterlee _ A Child's View.
page.content: In the following pages we shall see childrens' work, done with minimal adult interference. Although only 30 years old,{Peterlee}is in an area rich in{tradition}and steeped in{industrial {history.}From being a{mining community the area underwent a change with new {factories and their workers,}which is still going on with the{impending {closure of another pit}in the area.The {problems of a moving population}are covered,along with the{planned closure {of the local Maternity Hospital.}Views on{improving Peterlee,}its{housing {problems,}both old and new, and the religious character of the area are expressed,as well as{opposing views about the town. In an area of high unemployment,{leisure}plays an important role covering several pages, including the{Juvenile Jazz Band,}the {Town Carnival}and the{Leisure Centre.}
